title: Qian Qichen_Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China

quotes: In 1997, in the capacity of member of the Chinese government delegation, Vice Premier and Foreign Minister concurrently, he went to Hong Kong to observe the ceremony of the handover of Hong Kong.
In April 1998, he was appointed member of the Preparatory Committee of the National People's Congress for Macao Special Administrative Region.

issues.description: The event is classified as a career_position, but the role 'member of the Chinese government delegation' might be more accurately described as a temporary assignment rather than a long-term position.
The event lacks end_date information, making it unclear how long the roles were held.
